info.name: Open Files with MS Office
info.summary: Open files with MS Office for viewing or editing (via WebDav)
info.description:
This adds a new context menu item to the Files dropdown menu "Edit with MS Office".

Clicking that item will open the file in the respective MS Office application via WebDav (the file can then be edited and saved back directly in MS Office).
Clicking on the item itself will open the file for viewing in MS Office instead of downloading it.

This greatly improves the user experience when working with Office files in the browser. No need to download, edit, reupload. Instead use the "Edit with MS Office" item.
